entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 5.3°C
entry.summary:

Visibility: 80.5 km

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 7.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 increasing to 50 gusting to 70 except gusting to 90 in a few localities this afternoon. High 7. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers overnight. Wind southwest 50 km/h gusting to 70 except gusting to 90 in a few localities early this evening. Wind becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 this evening then light overnight. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers. High 6. POP 60%
